abstract: Interval Licensing is suing a cluster of defendants, including AOL, eBay, Facebook, Netflix, Office Depot, OfficeMax, Staples, Yahoo and YouTube.
snippet: Interval Licensing is suing a cluster of defendants, including AOL, eBay, Facebook, Netflix, Office Depot, OfficeMax, Staples, Yahoo and YouTube.
lead_paragraph: A company owned by Paul Allen, co-founder of Microsoft, filed suit on Friday against Google, Apple and nine other companies, contending that their online navigation and viewing technology illegally uses patented inventions created by Mr. Allen’s research firm, which is now defunct.

headline.main: Paul Allen’s Company Files Broad Lawsuit Over Patents
headline.print_headline: Paul Allen’s Company Files Broad Lawsuit Over Patents

abstract: Google continues to build up its social expertise with the acquisition of Angstro.
snippet: Google continues to build up its social expertise with the acquisition of Angstro.
lead_paragraph: Google continues to expand its social expertise with the acquisition of Angstro, a small social networking start-up.

headline.main: Google Acquires Angstro, a Social Networking Start-Up

abstract: The Department of Justice has asked for more information to assess Google’s acquisition of ITA Software.
snippet: The Department of Justice has asked for more information to assess Google’s acquisition of ITA Software.
lead_paragraph: Google said Friday that the Department of Justice this week requested more information and time to review the search giant’s acquisition of ITA Software, the flight information company.

headline.main: Government Takes Closer Look at Google’s ITA Acquisition
